meanings.sent1: The small kitten was defenseless against the big dog.
meanings.sent2: The defenseless child needed help crossing the busy street.
meanings.sent3: The defenseless teddy bear looked up at the towering shelf, wishing it could climb.
meanings.sent4: The defenseless flower wilted under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The defenseless bird huddled in its nest during the storm, seeking shelter.

meanings.sent1: Feeling defenseless, she called for help when the car broke down.
meanings.sent2: The defenseless rabbit froze when it saw the approaching predator.
meanings.sent3: The defenseless phone battery died just as she was about to make an important call.
meanings.sent4: The defenseless player was tackled hard during the game.
meanings.sent5: The defenseless caterpillar transformed into a butterfly, gaining strength and protection.
